cause.description:
You may already know the world's religions are being controlled by Dogmatik, an Aztec-dog-spirit who resides in outer space. But you might not know you can cure yourself from religion by making yourself a tin-foil hat and joining the Confusionists.
http://www.theconfusionists.org/comic.html
Join The Tin-Foil Hat Appreciation Society Group to upload a picture of you wearing your hat:
http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2418354919
1. Tin-foil hats are fashionable.
2. Tin-foil hats are the key to world peace.
3. Tin-foil hats enhance your sex life.
cause.mission: protect YOUR brain from religious mind control.
cause.name: Protect Your Mind: Wear A Tin-Foil Hat
